In order to use the app, please agree to the Terms of Use and confirm that you have read and understood the Privacy Policy. Only data that is essential for the functioning of the services is collected.

Device covers may make it difficult to connect via NFC.
Try not to move the medical card.

Managing Director: Dr. med. Markus Leyck Dieken
Register Court: District Court of Berlin-Charlottenburg
Commercial register no.: HRB 96351
VAT ID: DE241843684
We strive to use gender-sensitive language. If you notice any errors, we would be pleased to hear from you by email.
Germany\'s modern platform for digital medicine
Protect your health information from unauthorised access.
You do not have any current prescriptions
Improved protection of your data with a fingerprint or face scan.
Mark this prescription as redeemed as soon as you have received your medication.
Please follow the directions for use in your medication schedule or the written dosage instructions from your doctor.
Do you want to permanently delete this prescription?
This is a matter of urgency
This medication can also be redeemed in a pharmacy at night without an emergency service fee.
Substitutes are permitted. You may be given an alternative due to the legal requirements of your health insurance.
Please note that prescribed medication may also be subject to additional payments.
Redeem the following prescriptions with binding effect at %s?
Can only be redeemed today as self-paying customer
An NFC-enabled smartphone with at least Android 7
Please enable the NFC function on your device to log in with your medical card.
How do I get a new medical card?
Your health insurance company will be able to help you with this.
How do I get a PIN?
You will receive a PIN for your medical card in a separate letter from your health insurance company.
Would you like to mark the prescriptions as redeemed?
This change will only take effect after the app is restarted.
Help us make this app better. All user data is collected anonymously and is used solely to improve the user experience.
In the event of a crash or an error in the app, the app sends us information about the reasons along with the operating system version and details of the hardware used.
Prevents the display of a preview image when switching apps
Do you consent to the anonymous analysis of usage behaviour by e-prescription?
All access data to the health network will be deleted. Your prescription data will be retained.
This will delete your login details.
Would you like to log out of the app?

Please be aware that people with whom you may share this device and whose biometrics may be stored on this device or who have the device PIN, swipe pattern or password may also have access to your prescriptions.
Show this code at your pharmacy.
You haven\'t received any messages yet
Unfortunately, your pharmacy\'s message was empty. Please contact your pharmacy.
We couldn\'t find any results with this search term.
Analyse user flows in the %s app to improve usability.
Send crashes and error messages %s to the developers.
Detect error patterns at an early stage to improve the technical hotline.
I would like to help improve the app
You can modify this decision in the system settings at any time
This comprises the hardware and software information of your phone, e-prescription app settings and the extent of use, but never your personal or health data.
The data is provided exclusively by data processing providers to gematik GmbH and deleted after a maximum of 180 days. You can disable the analysis again at any time via the menu in the app.

We can use this data to understand which functions are used frequently and improve them. Furthermore, we can assess how long older technology needs to be supported and when we can, for example, make a newer operating system version mandatory without affecting (too many) users.
There may be a delay before redeemed prescriptions are moved to the archive.
You need to be logged on to delete prescriptions.
Error message from the e-prescription app

I would like to send the following information to the service team for troubleshooting purposes. Please note that we will see your email address and any name you include. If you do not wish to transfer this information either in full or in part, please remove it from this email. All data will only be stored or processed by gematik GmbH or its contracted companies to deal with this error message. Data is deleted automatically a maximum of 180 days after the ticket has been conclusively dealt with. We will use your email address exclusively to contact you regarding this error message. If you have any questions, or require earlier deletion, you can contact the data protection representative responsible for the e-prescription system. You can find further information in the menu via the Privacy Policy entry in the e-prescription app.
Please identify yourself in order to download prescriptions.
You have received a substitute medication
Please follow the directions for use in your medication schedule or the written dosage instructions from your doctor.

Note to pharmacies: we obtain the contact details for and information about pharmacies from mein-apothekenportal.de provided by the Deutscher Apothekenverband e.V. Have you found an error or would you like to correct any data?
Enables the app to be zoomed in/out by moving fingers together or apart on the screen (pinch-to-zoom).
Secure your data with a password of your choice.
The following information about the hardware and operating system you use is transferred when you send an email:
This app helps you to apply for a new electronic medical card. You will not be charged for this.

resources.string: We process your device information!\nThis app uses the ML Kit from Google to read the prescription code. By clicking \"Accept\", you agree to Google occasionally accessing device information and processing it for the purpose of usage analysis, diagnostics and configuration of the ML Kit. You have the right to revoke your consent at any time, although this will not affect the lawfulness of any processing already performed. However, such a revocation will mean that the prescription code scanner cannot be used.
Your medical card\'s certificate is invalid. Your card may have expired. Please contact your health insurance company.
This may be a fingerprint, swipe pattern or similar
Click to copy the token to the clipboard
Please try again in a few minutes.
How would you like to secure this app?
This app uses the most secure method provided by your device, which may be a fingerprint, swipe pattern or similar.
No device security has been set up for this device
We recommend that you add additional protection for your medical data by securing your device for instance with a code or biometrics.
Do not show this message in future.
Connection failed. A network connection could not be created.
Communication with the server failed: status code %s.
Communication with the server failed: VAU error
This device may not be fully trustworthy
This app should not be used on rooted devices for security reasons.
I acknowledge the increased risk and would like to continue anyway.
Why are devices with root access a potential security risk?
In brief: log in with health insurance app
Secure log in with your new electronic medical card
Use an app from your health insurance company for activation
How would you like to log in?
You need to log in to receive prescriptions automatically and to easily redeem or reserve medications online.
Man logging in using health insurance app
Woman logging in using health insurance app
Unfortunately your device does not have NFC which is required to use this function.
Please enter a name for the new profile.
You can use an NFC-enabled medical card and the associated PIN to log into this app.
You can obtain one free of charge from your health insurance company. You need to provide an official form of indentification as proof of identity.
How to identify an NFC-enabled medical card
What would you like to apply for?
Contact is not possible via this app
Please contact your health insurance company via the usual channels.
You need a suitable NFC-enabled card to log in. We will help you order one.
The name field cannot be empty.
A profile with this name already exists.
All data belonging to the profile will be deleted on this device. Your prescriptions in the health network will be retained.
You would like to delete the last profile.
The app requires at least one profile. Please enter a name for the new profile.
The register of medical cards could not be reached. Please try again.
This will connect to the health network. You will automatically receive new prescriptions or notifications.
You can find professionally verified information on illnesses, ICD codes and issues around prevention and healthcare in the National Health Portal.
We have amended the Privacy Policy
The e-prescription app has evolved, so we have had to update our Privacy Policy.
What happens when you open the app?
What happens if I use the camera function/read prescriptions using the camera?
Here you can see who has accessed your prescriptions
This relates to access keys for the prescription service
Your doctor will send the prescription directly to the pharmacy.
Log into the prescription service to receive access logs.
No access logs are available yet.
The prescription is currently being processed and cannot be deleted
This profile has not yet been linked to a policy number. You need to log on to the prescription server to do so.
Log in to the prescription server?
Conveniently receive and redeem new prescriptions

We are aware that connecting using your medical card has its quirks. For that reason, in future it should be possible to log in using a health insurance company's app that has previously been authenticated.

We are also working on enabling prescriptions to be redeemed digitally without the need to log in.

Did you notice anything during this process that you would like to share with us? We look forward to even very critical feedback.
Increase the strength of the connection
Remove the protective case if necessary.
If the device vibrates and then breaks off the connection, look for the ideal position within a small radius.
Only move the device very slowly over the card.
Place the device directly on to the card.
You can do so by placing the medical card on an even surface (e.g. a table).
Increase the strength of the connection
Note the position of the NFC sensor
Find out where the NFC sensor is on your device (for example, this is an overview of devices by %s).
In some cases the position of the NFC sensor may vary within a model series (these are the details for example for the %s).
How would you like to continue?
Reserve now for collection or for delivery by courier or mail order
Authentication via health insurance app not completed
The current profile is already connected to a different medical card (health insurance number %s).
Your medical card is already connected to a different profile. Switch to profile %s.
Please enter a telephone number for contact purposes.
Please enter a first name and surname for contact purposes.
Please enter a street and house number for contact purposes.
Please enter a postcode and town/city for contact purposes.
Your prescription will be sent to this pharmacy. You will then not be able to redeem it in any other pharmacy.
We need your contact details in order for the pharmacy to be able to advise you and let you know the current status of your order.
Your pharmacy will contact you soon.
Searches with the pharmacy directory use geocoordinates provided with the assistance of OpenStreetMap. We thank this project for their help.
What does this app help with?
Automatically receive prescriptions issued to you and members of your family
You will have received your PIN in a letter from your health insurance company.
Check your connection to the Internet and your device\'s time/date setting.
Locked out? Please review your biometric access data on this device.
Forgotten password? Please delete and reinstall the app. Find out why in our %s.
Would you like to help us improve the app?
The password needs to be at least eight characters long
Profile names help you keep track if you want to manage prescriptions for more than one person.
You do not currently have any prescriptions that can be redeemed.
Your will be disconnected from the prescription server 12 hours for security reasons. Reconnect to retrieve current prescriptions.
Have you received a paper print-out?
Add prescriptions to your list by tapping the scan button in the top right corner.
You need to be logged in to receive prescriptions automatically.
Your redeemed prescriptions are displayed here. Your prescriptions will be deleted from the prescription server after 100 days on data protection grounds.
Your redeemed prescriptions are displayed here. Scan new prescriptions to start the redemption process.
Note: The first pharmacy to accept a prescription blocks it for processing by another pharmacy.

resources.string: Enter the PIN of your medical card to log on to the prescription server.
What would you like to remove %s?
If you remove %s, the connection to the prescription server will be permanently cut off in a maximum of 12 hours.
There are no devices associated with this medical card.
Device list could not be loaded.
Issue of prescription-only medicines as per section 4 AMVV
We have put a few tips together for you to solve the most common problems.
The PIN was entered incorrectly three times. Your card has therefore been blocked for security reasons.
You will have received an 8-digit PUK along with your PIN from your health insurance company.
You can choose your new personal identification number (PIN) with 6 to 8 digits.
Please make a note of your PIN and keep it in a safe place.
You\'ve used this PUK to unlock your card the maximum number of times or have repeatedly entered it incorrectly. Please contact your health insurance company.
You can use a PUK to unlock up to 10 times.
Receive prescriptions online and forward them to a pharmacy.
Don\'t have an NFC-enabled medical card and PIN yet?
"Your card access number (CAN) is located in the top right-hand corner on the front of your medical card."
My medical card has no access number

resources.string: Place medical card on the back of the phone
The following process can take up to 30 seconds.
Place card %s on the back of the phone.
Didn\'t find what you were looking for? This list is constantly being expanded. Login with a medical card is already supported by every health insurance company.
We look forward to your feedback. Please use the space below and word your comments as precisely as possible:

Unfortunately, your device does not meet the minimum requirements for logging into the e-prescription app. For secure authentication with your medical card, at least Android 7 and an NFC chip are required.
Enter the PIN of your medical card to log on to the prescription server.\n\n
Access data cannot be saved. Set up biometric protection (e.g. fingerprint) on your device beforehand.
\"This app uses the most secure biometric sensor provided by your device to store your access data in the secure area of the device memory. \"
Using biometric protection for your access data means that you can launch this app in future without your medical card and PIN in order to view, retrieve, redeem or delete prescriptions.

Please be aware that people with whom you may share this device and whose biometrics may be stored on this device or who have the device PIN, swipe pattern or password may also have access to your prescriptions.
Authentication with the health insurance company\'s app was successful.
